channel.title: Im going to bed but...... i need help ill check for awensers in morning
channel.description:
ok, im going to bed for the night and heres something i would LIKE i repeat i am not demanding but it would b nice, here they are fire houses, i saw these earlier, Where it says pimpscape quests on the quest screen how do i change that? how do i change the ice barrage size? can i make the admins higher lvls than the normal players and mods? if so how?
[b]please note im a newb b so plz all in newb languages[/b]
read the bold print plz, good night, if u cant answer and be at least 75% sure of your answser plz dont post and plz read again bold print above
ps: i have the source of RS2legends pkz ((pimpscape))
good? i might check back later if theres anymore problems.... i dont sleep very well, especially seen as its 80 degrees in my house right now :mad: :(

item.title: Im going to bed but...... i need help ill check for awensers in morning
item.dc:creator: @Pur3_Mag3 Pur3 Mag3
item.description:
@Pur3_Mag3 wrote:

d shadow7 0:

fire houses, i saw these earlier,

By fire houses im guessing you mean the walls and roofs looked like the lava cape? You have to make a client and do all that in a client, its not posible to do server side as far as i know. Go to the client hacking section download a client and use the texture tutorial.

Read full topic

item.title: Im going to bed but...... i need help ill check for awensers in morning
item.dc:creator: @deltorz deltorz
item.description:
@deltorz wrote:

[quote=“d shadow7 0, post:1, topic:87359”]Where it says pimpscape quests on the quest screen how do i change that?
if so how?[/quote]

simply go into your client.java and search for ‘pimpscape quests’
shouldn’t be too hard ;D

Read full topic
